original_text: See, I am standing beside this spring, and the daughters of the townspeople are coming out to draw water.
korean_text: 성 중 사람의 딸들이 물 길으러 나오겠사오니 내가 우물 곁에 서 있다가

sentences.original_text: I am standing beside this spring
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 샘 곁에 서 있다

sentences.original_text: and the daughters of the townspeople
are coming out to draw water
